TopicTitle: tech tree vs upgrading buildings (patched conics)

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to shift gaining patched conics become available to something to be researched in the tech tree vs something you get by upgrading the tracking station? It seems silly to me that patched conics becomes possible after upgrading tracking. Seems like it'd be something that is unlocked in from the Precision Engineering node. A similar situation with being able to pump resources around. Why would upgrading R&D give me that ability. That should be something possible after unlocking the Fuel Systems node in the tech tree.

If there is a way to do this sort of thing with a mod, are there any examples in the wild?

20 hours ago, seanth said:

Is there a way to shift gaining patched conics become available to something to be researched in the tech tree vs something you get by upgrading the tracking station? It seems silly to me that patched conics becomes possible after upgrading tracking. Seems like it'd be something that is unlocked in from the Precision Engineering node. A similar situation with being able to pump resources around. Why would upgrading R&D give me that ability. That should be something possible after unlocking the Fuel Systems node in the tech tree.

If there is a way to do this sort of thing with a mod, are there any examples in the wild?

I am not positive, so take this with a grain of salt, but I believe by using Custom Barn Kit and Contract Configurator you could create some magic that would allow that to happen.
